item.title: Why use Git?
item.description:
What’s the deal with Git?

Have you ever had to collaborate with multiple people on a word document? You know how ridiculous it can look when you turn on track changes:

It gets even worse when multiple people have sent you their revisions over email attachments, and you have to somehow merge the document together. We...

item.title: Hosting a PHP application
item.description:
How to host a PHP application like Hapitjeter

HapiTjeter is a standard PHP application that runs on the internet. In this tutorial I’ll show you how to use a public hosting service to install your own version of HapiTjeter, or any other PHP application. We’ll go through the steps all the way from downloading the code, through configuring your MySQL database, and finally setting up ...

item.title: What is this blog?
item.description:
What is this blog?

This blog is where Cru Digital Strategies Albania will talk about the various projects that we’re working on, who is working on them, and how you can get involved. The purpose is to get more people excited about sharing code and getting involved.

Who’s it for?

Anyone who has a passion for digital content and wants to reach people for Christ through digital media! We welcome any and all help...
